TopicTitle: [BUG] Gimbals refuse to function unless engine is staged.

Articles.Content:
Well a minor annoyance with my SSTOs, is that the engines refuse to enagage gimbal unless they are staged via the staging menu, not of you enable them via hotkey on start.

I do not use mods, and it seems to be a bug thats rather easy to replicate (just make any craft, strap engine to it, and watch the difference between engaging engine via hotkey, or via staging, gimball only works after it is staged.
